item.title: Managing Azure
item.description: For the past couple years I/we have been experimenting with moving digital content to Azure, both for storage and as a web app host. The most prominent case is with regard to Rootstalk where Azure currently supports two (recently down from three) static development apps as well as a storage account. All such services are part of a personal* Azure subscription opened under the digital@grinnell.edu email address. *I call this a “personal” account because charges for it are currently billed to my own credit card, a situation that will need to be changed sometime relatively soon.
